text: Shock Treatment is a 1981 American musical comedy movie directed by Jim Sharman and starring Jessica Harper, Cliff De Young, Richard O'Brien, Patricia Quinn, Nell Campbell, Ruby Wax, Rik Mayall, Charles Gray, Barry Humphries. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * * Category:1980s musical movies Category:1981 comedy movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:American independent movies
title: Shock Treatment
